DOC.detailed_description: The study consist 2 screen visit 8 study visit . Screening visit 1 : 1 hour fast 9pm prior night . Height weight measure , vital sign take questionnaire complete . Women urine pregnancy test . Blood draw chemistry panel blood count . Screening visit 2 : 1 hour , Medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( heart trace ) . Visit 1-8 4 hour . 8 separate occasion , 7 day visit . ON visit , blood pressure , pulse temperature record . A rest metabolic rate ( RMR ) measure . After baseline measurement 30 minute breathe take , pill swallow metabolism ( measure breathing clear plastic hood upper body measure metabolic rate ( oxygen inhale carbon dioxide exhale ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female age 18 50 year , inclusive . Have body mass index 19 40 kg/M2 ( number calculate height weight ) , inclusive . Female pregnant nursing . Woman childbearing potential agree use effective method contraception trial . Acceptable method include abstinence , barrier method , intrauterine device , hormonal method contraception . A smoker use nicotine . Take regular medication birth control pill . Use medication know alter metabolic rate ( asthma medication ) .
